purpose: Phase-P governs implementation of the planning runtime as code artifacts only. All runtime behavior, execution, activation, autonomy, and goal authority remain prohibited.
preconditions_confirmed: No execution, autonomy, or activation enabled
explicit_constraints: Code may be written but must not execute
No runtime entrypoints may be registered
No tick, scheduler, or dispatch hooks permitted
All modules must fail closed if invoked
notes: Phase-P entered in non-executable implementation mode. Any attempt to run or activate code is a governance violation.
